column2: By the order of the Grand Master of the Assassins, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! is responsible for collecting the debt of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! must infiltrate the target's residence and threaten [Root.GetHerHim] to give the money back.

Rally support amongst the other vassals of [This.Holder.Liege.GetTitledName] in an attempt to fabricate a claim on the [This.GetFullBaseName]. God willing, you may some day rightfully take the title from [This.Holder.GetTitledFirstName].
Rally support amongst the vassals of [This.Holder.GetTitledName] in an attempt to fabricate a claim on the [This.GetFullBaseName]. God willing, you may some day become their new liege.
Rally support amongst the other vassals of [This.Holder.GetTitledName] in an attempt to fabricate a claim on the [This.GetFullBaseName]. God willing, you may some day become their new liege.
[From.GetBestName] is plotting to become ruler of the [This.GetFullName].
[From.GetBestName] is plotting to revoke the title of [This.GetFullBaseName].

§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has decided it is time for §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! to depart this world. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and [From.GetPossPronoun] backers will look for opportunities to kill §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! - the higher the Plot Power, the more likely they are to find openings.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has decided it is time for [From.GetPossPronoun] spouse §Y[This.GetFirstName]§! to depart this world.
Strike a blow for freedom everywhere by usurping control over the [This.GetName] Trade Post.
Weaken the power base of [This.Holder.GetTitledName] by dividing [This.Holder.GetHerHis] holdings and granting the [This.GetFullName] to one of [This.Holder.GetHerHis] vassals.
See the [This.GetFullName] granted to a new ruler
